title: Contract Software Engineer / Data Engineer
highlights: Contracted by PEI Group to support the acquisition of FundFilter
Integrated key FundFilter product features and data into PEI's existing infrastructure.
In November 2023 I transitioned to the Data Engineering team to migrate the existing FundFilter data ingest pipeline into Databricks.
I completed my work in May of 2024 and stepped away for some time off.

title: Chief Technology Officer
highlights: I took the lead of development process from the previous developer and brought the company's flagship product to market.
During the process I undertook rebuild of the application layout, which dramatically improved rendering speed and animation performance.
I also completely revamped the data ingest pipeline resulting in a 12x speed improvement.
For the sale of FundFilter to PEI Group in 2022, I supported the due diligence proceedings by providing technical expertise and recommendations to both companies.

title: Senior Software Engineer
highlights: In a pivotal part of a small dev team, we built a stable, long lasting product that continues to produce revenue today with little maintenance.
With clients including Eminem, Celine Dion, Alyssa Milano, and Yes Theory, built a system that could scale to millions of page views.

title: Chief Technology Officer
highlights: I joined the three founding members of MicroHero as a minority partner a few months into product development. We built an iOS app and a companion web application which allowed users to generate micro-donations to a charity of their choosing by completing surveys. In 2016 I, along with a new partner, purchased the company from the 3 founders. Unfortunately, after a series of pivots we ultimately failed to find a market fit for the product and folded the company in late 2018.

title: Senior Software Developer
highlights: I joined Yardly a few short weeks after it's inception to build and lead a brand new software development team. Together we designed and built Yardly's Uber-like software platform: a suite of iOS, Android, and web applications. Working closely with the company founders, I guided and shaped the brand, business model, culture, and direction of the company.
